name: Trimwind
description:
Simple Arcade-Adventure platform game.
Game is about Wergran, who took his steps into weird magic territory, where he met gilmmers. Hunters for Wergran.

All is about runing from the glimmer. You need to be cautious, couse he like to patrol his territory. In some mistery reason, he want to catch every soul he feel'd. You can hide from him in bushes,  where he can't sense you. Worse, if you don't move. Less you move, more you have a chance to be sensed by the glimmer.

FETURES:
- Intresting AI
- Varied Levels
- Great 2d Audio Quality


A - Left
D - Right
SPACE - Jump
A/D + SPACE - Direct jump
Shift - Stop moving

Official Game Site -> https://sites.google.com/view/trimwind/english
